document.full_text: the number of planned layoffs at u.s. firms rose modestly in may with the government and non-profit sectors making up a large portion of the cuts, a report on wednesday showed.
document.title: planned layoffs up slightly in may: challenger
lines_and_colors: the number of planned layoffs at u.s. firms rose modestly in may with the government and non-profit sectors making up a large portion of the cuts, a report on wednesday showed.
